item.title: [PI] Balmung Effects? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xShrawenx xShrawenx
item.description:
@xShrawenx wrote:

Hey. I would like to know how i can make balmung hit higher on dagannoths. So far i have just copied dharok armours effect and pasted / edited it to balmungs information. It looks like this at the moment:
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15403) {
maxHit += (c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) - c.playerLevel[3]) / 2;
}

Could you help me out how i can make it hit higher ONLY on DAGANNOTHS. Please help me. (Use newbie language)
Hybridpvp Source.
